chapter.title: Exporting Information from Tracker Model Documents

section.title: Exporting Functionality

warning.para: The functionality described in this chapter is provided on an interim basis only. It will be depreciated in the future when the Tracker reporting infrastructure is implemented.

section.para: Model Document Export Functionality is provided by utilities that are called from Tracker Editor menu items. These menus are accessible from the main Tracker Editor menu.

listitem.para:
The menu item
Fair Registration XLS file...
will export the following Excel Spreadsheet information:
Worksheets exported by
Fair Registration XLS file...
WorkSheet Name
Properties exported
Comments
Fair WeighIn and Registration
Parent, Club, Breed, WeighIn Date, Weight, Ear Tag
Combined listing focusing on the Registration and WeighIn Events

The menu item
Fair Registration Raw Event XLS file...
will export the following Excel Spreadsheet information:
Worksheets exported by
Fair Registration XLS file...
WorkSheet Name
Properties exported
Comments
Fair Registration Events
Ear Tag, Date, Participant, Address, Phone, Parent, Club
Fair registration event details
Weigh-In Events
Ear Tag, Date, Weight
WeighIn Event details
MovedIn Events
Ear Tag, Date, SourcePin
MovedIn Event details
MovedOut Events
Ear Tag, Date, DestinationPin
MovedOut Event details

section.title: Exporting WLIC Information from Tracker Model Documents
section.para: Animal records submitted to the Wisconsin Livestock Identification Consortium WLIC utilize a specific file format.
The menu item WLIC file... will export the Tracker Model Document in a WLIC file format.
